rules_text:
[i]Sea's Might[/i] – Athena gets +1/+1 for each Island on the battlefield.
[i]Repayed Kindness[/i] – If you would create one or more Treasures, create that many plus one Treasures instead.
[i]Leap Aboard[/i] – {U}{R}: Target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {1}{U}{R}
